name: Lost Path (Louis Denizet)
description:
Lost Path is a narrative game in which you play a red panda forgotten by his family after a gun shot in the forest during winter.

You can move with arrow keys.
You can sprint with space.

You will have to face 4 main dangers :
- Cold is the main one, if you don't warm up often you will die freezing.
- Wolves will try to catch you.
- Wolf trap are really dangerous.
- Don't fall into the cold water.

The way we interpreted the theme (we weren't sure what the theme implicated!) was that when you go out of the screen you always come back to the same screen which one evolves with your progression.

Usually we make games really focused on gameplay and this time we tried to make a game around emotions and mood.

This time we had a sound designer and musician with us that really pulled us to work on the emotional and mood size of the game.

He has a sister with good english accent (we are french ^^) so he had to idea to put voices with text and that achieved the idea of narrative for kids!

Thanks a lot to both of them for this great time !

The sound designer has been particulary imaginative to create sounds, nearly each sound has a really fun story ;)

We really hope you enjoy the experience as much as we did!

Team :
- Graphisms : Mélissandre Samson
- Sound and music : Benjamin Baldassini
- Game design and programmation : Louis Denizet
- With the voice of : Marine Baldassini
